name: .PUPPET
summary: Learn about .PUPPET files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can only open a PUPPET file with Adobe Character Animator in Windows and macOS. To open a PUPPET file, select File → Import... or drag the PUPPET file into the Project panel in Character Animator.

To place a puppet in a scene in Character Animator, select the puppet in the Project panel, then click Add to New Scene or select Object → Add to New Scene. You can also drag the puppet from the Project panel directly into the scene in a Character Animator .CHPROJ project file.
Character Animator can convert PUPPET files to several file types, including the following formats:
